hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select * from users where IsApproved = 1 and id not in (select distinct u.id from users u, teamsplayers tp, teams t, divisions d, seasons s where u.Id = tp.UserId and s.id in (select SeasonId from divisions where Id in (select divisionid from teams where id = tp.teamid)) and s.id = :SeasonId);
